name: Soul Purpose
description:
Soul Purpose is a puzzle game first and foremost, but it does have elements of plataforming and object finding games,  you play as a thief that got caught in a spell while robbing a wizard, that separated your soul from your body, causing the latter to simply wander forward without stopping. The problem is that there are several pits and traps along the way, you will have to use your soul to possess your environment and make it so your body doesn't walk into certain death. Having to focus on so many things at once while watching your body coming closer to danger from outside becomes quite thrilling.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Commands:

Forward - W

Backward - S

Left - A

Right - D

Fly up - Left Mouse Button

Fly down - Right Mouse Button

Possess object - Q

Relase possession - E

Control camera - Move mouse
